abstract: The Commission on Presidential Debates announces that the 2012 face-offs will take place in Denver, Long Island and Boca Raton, Fla.
snippet: The Commission on Presidential Debates announces that the 2012 face-offs will take place in Denver, Long Island and Boca Raton, Fla.

headline.print_headline: The General Election: 4 (Only 4!) Debates Next Fall
